title: Making Dumb Faces While Sampling NI Playbox for Octatrack
description:
Playbox is a wild sample-based Kontakt Instrument by Native Instruments that offers some pretty immediately chop-ready results. In this video, we'll make some samples with Playbox and then I'll show you how I've been using the Octatrack for sample-based music.

https://www.native-instruments.com/en/products/komplete/synths/playbox/

Patrons get the samples: https://www.patreon.com/posts/64479464

00:00 sampling playbox
13:40 beat making on the octatrack
